entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
